info.title: Broadcast Service API
info.description: A delivery service through which content is provided via broadcast over the air or online.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword search for item

parameters.name: additionaltype
parameters.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the \'typeof\' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

parameters.name: aggregaterating
parameters.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

parameters.name: alternatename
parameters.description: An alias for the item.

parameters.name: areaserved
parameters.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided. Supersedes serviceArea.
parameters.type: geoshape or  administrativearea or  text or  place

parameters.name: availablechannel
parameters.description: A means of accessing the service (e.g. a phone bank, a web site, a location, etc.).

parameters.name: award
parameters.description: An award won by or for this item. Supersedes awards.

parameters.name: broadcastaffiliateof
parameters.description: The media network(s) whose content is broadcast on this station.

parameters.name: broadcastdisplayname
parameters.description: The name displayed in the channel guide. For many US affiliates, it is the network name.

parameters.name: broadcaster
parameters.description: The organization owning or operating the broadcast service.

parameters.name: broadcasttimezone
parameters.description: The timezone in ISO 8601 format for which the service bases its broadcasts.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A short description of the item.

parameters.name: hasoffercatalog
parameters.description: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

parameters.name: hoursavailable
parameters.description: The hours during which this service or contact is available.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

parameters.name: mainentityofpage
parameters.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.            See background notes for details.       Inverse property: mainEntity.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the item.

parameters.name: offers
parameters.description: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.

parameters.name: parentservice
parameters.description: A broadcast service to which the broadcast service may belong to such as regional variations of a national channel.

parameters.name: potentialaction
parameters.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an \'object\' role.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller. Supersedes carrier.

parameters.name: providermobility
parameters.description: Indicates the mobility of a provided service (e.g. \'static\', \'dynamic\').

parameters.name: providesbroadcastservice
parameters.description: The BroadcastService offered on this channel.

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: A broadcast service associated with the publication event.

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: A review of the item. Supersedes reviews.

parameters.name: sameas
parameters.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item\'s identity. E.g. the URL of the item\'s Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

parameters.name: serviceoutput
parameters.description: The tangible thing generated by the service, e.g. a passport, permit, etc. Supersedes produces.

parameters.name: servicetype
parameters.description: The type of service being offered, e.g. veterans\' benefits, emergency relief, etc.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the item.

parameters.name: videoformat
parameters.description: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item
